question: Medicare Advantage (Medicare Part C)
text:
Medicare Advantage (Medicare Part C)
          
        
A type of Medicare health plan offered by a private company that contracts with Medicare to provide you with all your Part A and Part B benefits. Medicare Advantage Plans include
Health Maintenance Organizations (HMO),

Preferred Provider Organizations (PPO)
, Private Fee-for-Service Plans, Special Needs Plans, and Medicare Medical Savings Account Plans. If you're enrolled in a Medicare Advantage Plan, most Medicare services are covered through the plan and aren't paid for under Original Medicare. Most Medicare Advantage Plans offer prescription drug coverage.
